items.source: Evaluation questions – short term project outcome statement(s)

columns.title: Has the outcome been achieved for the project?

items.source: Evaluation questions – medium term project outcome statement(s)

columns.title: Has the outcome been achieved for the project?
What are the key threats being addressed by this projects?
Has the project succeeded in mitigating the key threats?
Are there any new threats to the priority threatened species for this projects?
Which key interventions have been implemented to stabilise or have improve the trajectory of the priority threatened species for this projects?
Have the interventions been successfully implemented for the priority threatened species?
What intervention has been the most effective for achieving the long-term outcome for the priority threatened species?
Which attributes of the trajectory for the priority threatened species (e.g. distribution, population size, habitat availability etc.) have been addressed by this project?
Has the trajectory of the priority threatened species changed (i.e. improved or declined)  within the project boundary?

items.source: Evaluation questions – relationships between threats, interventions and priority threatened species

columns.title: Have the interventions changed the key threats to the priority threatened species for this project?
Have the interventions changed the trajectories of the priority threatened species for this project?

items.source: What other drivers have caused changes to key threats to the priority threatened species for this project?
What other drivers have caused changes to the trajectories of the priority threatened species for this project?
What primary datasets have been generated by this project that could be included into a long-term monitoring program to inform future projects and/or species level assessments?

items.preLabel: Have there been any unexpected or unintended outcomes delivered by this project?
Has the project increased our knowledge of best practice NRM for this priority threatened species?
Has the project achieved behaviour change in community participants in terms of their NRM management actions?
Has this project improved the capacity of Traditional Owners to lead or assist with the management of this priority threatened species?

items.source: If you were designing the next phase of this project, what would you do differently?
Evaluation - Project outcome(only include in five-year report)

columns.title: Can you demonstrate that there has been a stabilisation or improvement in the trajectory for the priority threatened species relative to the established project baseline, which you can attribute to the project interventions?
